Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This unique offering is not just an item; it's a testament to innovation and quality that we're confident you'll appreciate deeply. Given its exceptional value and craftsmanship, we're extending an exclusive opportunity to acquire this masterpiece at a special introductory price of $9500. We believe this is an extraordinary value considering its worth and the benefits it offers. We look forward to the possibility of bringing this remarkable product into your collection. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
